text: Bipadapada sparsa karara para ami yadi take amara anugraha asbadana kara'i, takhana se balate thake, eta ye amara yogya prapya; ami mane kari na ye, keyamata sanghatita habe. Ami yadi amara palanakartara kache phire ya'i, tabe abasya'i tara kache amara jan'ya kalyana rayeche. Ata'eba, ami kapheraderake tadera karma samparke abasya'i abahita karaba ebam taderake abasya'i asbadana karaba kathina sasti.
